duties_responsibilities.duty: Connect with customers and build strong relationships to drive sales and meet revenue targets.
Utilize outgoing and persuasive communication skills to engage with potential customers and present sales offerings effectively.
Demonstrate the ability to climb on small buildings or roofs as part of the sales process when needed.
Participate in training programs to enhance sales skills and product knowledge.
Maintain a flexible schedule to accommodate customer availability and maximize sales opportunities.
Exceed productivity expectations by working a solid 30 hours a week, with the potential to increase earnings by putting in extra hours.
Select preferred working areas across Houston to optimize sales coverage and efficiency.
Contribute to the positive company culture and uphold the stable reputation of the organization.
